text: Truly those who say ‘Our Lord is God!’ and then remain upright adhering to the affirmation of God’s Oneness and to whatever else has been enjoined on them the angels descend upon them at the point of death saying to them ‘Do not fear death and what will come after it nor grieve for any family or children that you have left behind for we will look after them after you and rejoice in the good tidings of the paradise which you were promised.
